scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:passportCredentialIssuer:polygon:: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/deployPassportCredentialIssuer.ts --network polygon-amoy --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.upgrade:passportCredentialIssuer:polygon: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/upgradePassportCredentialIssuer.ts --network polygon-amoy --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.deploy:passportCredentialIssuer:billions: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/deployPassportCredentialIssuer.ts --network billions-test --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.upgrade:passportCredentialIssuer:billion: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/upgradePassportCredentialIssuer.ts --network billions-test --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.deploy:passportCredentialIssuer:localhos: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/deployPassportCredentialIssuer.ts --network localhost --strategy create2 --parameters ignition/modules/passportCredentialIssuer/parameters.json
